price: Namaz obavljajte, zekat dajite i idite na ruku‘ [1] zajedno s onima koji na ruku‘ idu!
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
footnotes: [1] Ovdje se spominje ruku', tj. pregibanje kao sastavni dio namaza, ali se misli na cijeli namaz.

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-ir'kaʿū maʿa al-rākiʿīna
